text: [5/N] At @InMobi
column4: we work to reduce or remove processes and let our culture & philosophy take over. We call our culture #YaWiO

text: [4/N] In fact if a start up gets the philosophy right
column4: and has a strong culture
column5: need for archaic processes reduces drastically. @InMobi

text: [3/N] Startups confuse HR to be a 'process' whereas it is a 'philosophy';Founders should own
column4: drive & live it. We @InMobi made our mistakes.

text: [2/N] Feel Culture is a philosophy and not a skill set issue
column4: early on people treat it as a skill too early @InMobi  https://t.co/vP4OdU7WvE

text: [1/N] Founders should be the CHRO
column4: as people & culture are paramount & must be ingrained
